      • density

        public static double density(double measuredLat,
                             double measuredLon,
                             double lat,
                             double lon,
                             double positionStandarddeviation)
        For a certain position measurement: what is the density value (according to the Gaussian distribution) at a cartain position.
        Parameters:
        measuredLat - measured position (latitude)
        measuredLon - measured position (longitude)
        lat - real position (latitude)
        lon - real position (longitude)
        positionStandarddeviation - the positionioning system's measurement error expressed as standard deviation value in meters
        Returns:
        the density value at lat, lon

      • randomPosition

        public static double[] randomPosition(double lat,
                                      double lon,
                                      double positionStandarddeviation)
        Generates a random position as measured by a Gaussian distributed positioning system. The real position and the standard deviation (in meters) is given.
        Parameters:
        lat - real position (latitude)
        lon - real position (longitude)
        positionStandarddeviation - the positionioning system's measurement error expressed as standard deviation value in meters
        Returns:
        an array of 3 with [0]: random position latitude, [1]: random position longitude, [2]: measurement error in meters (i.e. the distance between real and measured position)

      • randomPosition

        public static double[] randomPosition(double lat,
                                      double lon,
                                      double positionStandarddeviation,
                                      double positionMaxdeviation)
        Generates a random position as measured by a Gaussian distributed positioning system. The real position and the standard deviation (in meters) is given. In addition, a maximum deviation (in meters) may express the maximum distance error (actually a contradiction to the Gaussian distribution).
        Parameters:
        lat - real position (latitude)
        lon - real position (longitude)
        positionStandarddeviation - the positionioning system's measurement error expressed as standard deviation value in meters
        positionMaxdeviation - the positioning system's maximum deviation in meters
        Returns:
        an array of 3 with [0]: random position latitude, [1]: random position longitude, [2]: measurement error in meters (i.e. the distance between real and measured position)
